module.title: Tailwind CSS Basics
module.description: Build UIs fast with utility-first CSS classes

lessons.title: Utility-First Approach
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- Tailwind uses small utility classes instead of custom CSS
- `p-4` = padding, `m-2` = margin, `text-lg` = font size
- Combine classes: `bg-blue-500 text-white font-bold p-4 rounded`
- No more switching between HTML and CSS files

lessons.title: Spacing & Sizing
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- Spacing scale: `1` = 0.25rem, `4` = 1rem, `8` = 2rem
- Padding: `p-4`, `px-2`, `py-6`, `pt-3`, `pb-1`
- Margin: `m-4`, `mx-auto`, `my-2`, `mt-8`
- Width: `w-full`, `w-1/2`, `w-64`, `max-w-lg`
- Height: `h-screen`, `h-16`, `min-h-full`

lessons.title: Colors & Typography
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- Colors: `bg-blue-500`, `text-red-600`, `border-gray-300`
- Shades from 50 (lightest) to 950 (darkest)
- Text: `text-sm`, `text-lg`, `text-2xl`, `font-bold`, `font-mono`
- Custom colors in `tailwind.config.js`

lessons.title: Responsive Utilities
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- Breakpoint prefixes: `sm:`, `md:`, `lg:`, `xl:`, `2xl:`
- Mobile-first: unprefixed = all sizes
- `md:grid-cols-2` = 2 columns on medium+
- `hidden md:block` = hidden on mobile, visible on md+
